Original title: The Legend of Hercules (Hercules 3D)

Synopsis:
---------
In Ancient Greece, 1200 B.C. In a desperate attempt to free his people from the oppression of her vengeful husband, the queen Alcmene directed their supplications to the gods and born fruit of their prayers Hercules fathered by Zeus, father of gods and men. Unaware of his true identity, Hercules suffers Host contempt of the king, who always favors his legitimate son, Ificles.
